name: Sand Hag
description: The Sand Hag is a medium-sized, chaotic evil fey creature often found in sandy environments. It can disguise itself and others with illusory appearances, and manipulates the battlefield using hot winds and dense sand.
memorable: Its ability to mimic sounds and create illusions makes it a master of deception, posing a significant threat in its desert domain.
goals: To confuse and manipulate intruders while causing chaos.
relations: Other hags or fey creatures that enjoy chaotic practices.
strengths: High hit points, strong melee attacks with claw strikes, and resistance to magic.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to coordinated attacks from organized groups.
attacks: Performs three claw attacks that deal slashing damage; can impose exhaustion on targets with successful hits.
most_powerful_ability: Scouring Sirocco creates a damaging area of effect that blinds enemies and obscures vision.
senses: Has tremorsense within a 30-foot radius while in sandy terrain, making it difficult to hide from.
skills: Excels in Deception, making it a skilled deceiver, and has good Stealth and Perception abilities.
additional_information: Grants advantage on saving throws against spells due to Magic Resistance.
Leaves no tracks in sandy terrain through Scorpion Walk.
Can replicate animal sounds and humanoid voices with Mimicry.
Illusory Appearance disguises itself and its belongings.
Can create illusions of terrain to confuse enemies.
spellcasting: Can cast spells using Charisma, including at-will Silent Image and three times per day Hallucinatory Terrain and Major Image.
test_queries: monster in sandy terrain with exhaustion attacks
